text.en: Introduction
We collect the following specific data points to provide our services:

_ww-text_text.en: We collect the following specific data points to provide our services:

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeInUp { 0% { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

text.en: We use your information to:
Impact Tracking: To calculate and display your "My Impact" statistics (e.g., Animals Helped).

_ww-text_text.en: Impact Tracking: To calculate and display your "My Impact" statistics (e.g., Animals Helped).

text.en: Public Data: Your Name, Profile Picture, "I am" Role, Help Tags, and Impact Stats are visible to all users on the Platform.

_ww-text_text.en: Public Data: Your Name, Profile Picture, "I am" Role, Help Tags, and Impact Stats are visible to all users on the Platform.

text.en: Identity Data:
Name: To identify you on the feed.

_ww-text_text.en: Name: To identify you on the feed.

text.en: Profile Picture: To personalize your account and build community trust.

_ww-text_text.en: Profile Picture: To personalize your account and build community trust.

text.en: Mobile Number: Strictly for OTP login and account security.

_ww-text_text.en: Mobile Number: Strictly for OTP login and account security.

text.en: Profile Data:
"I am" Status: Your self-selected role (e.g., Feeder, Vet, NGO).

_ww-text_text.en: "I am" Status: Your self-selected role (e.g., Feeder, Vet, NGO).

text.en: "I can help with" Tags: Your selected help capabilities (e.g., Medical, Transport).

_ww-text_text.en: "I can help with" Tags: Your selected help capabilities (e.g., Medical, Transport).

text.en: We collect the text address you manually type into the app to display on your posts.

_ww-text_text.en: We collect the text address you manually type into the app to display on your posts.

text.en: Location Information (Manual Only):
Important: We DO NOT access, track, or store your real-time GPS or device geolocation.

_ww-text_text.en: Important: We DO NOT access, track, or store your real-time GPS or device geolocation.

text.en: User Content: Photos of animals, descriptions, and comments you submit.

_ww-text_text.en: User Content: Photos of animals, descriptions, and comments you submit.

text.en: Device Information: We collect device identifiers (tokens) to send you Push Notifications.

_ww-text_text.en: Device Information: We collect device identifiers (tokens) to send you Push Notifications.

text.en: To Connect Helpers: We use your "I can help with" tags and "I am" role to display your profile to users looking for specific assistance.

_ww-text_text.en: To Connect Helpers: We use your "I can help with" tags and "I am" role to display your profile to users looking for specific assistance.

text.en: Verification: We use your Mobile Number to authenticate your identity via OTP.

_ww-text_text.en: Verification: We use your Mobile Number to authenticate your identity via OTP.

text.en: Engagement: To notify you about Likes, Comments, and new cases nearby based on your profile settings.

_ww-text_text.en: Engagement: To notify you about Likes, Comments, and new cases nearby based on your profile settings.

text.en: Data Sharing & Visibility
Private Data: Your Mobile Number is NOT publicly displayed on the feed unless you explicitly write it inside a post description.

_ww-text_text.en: Private Data: Your Mobile Number is NOT publicly displayed on the feed unless you explicitly write it inside a post description.

text.en: Legal Requirements: We may share data with law enforcement if required by Indian law for investigation of animal cruelty or other crimes.

_ww-text_text.en: Legal Requirements: We may share data with law enforcement if required by Indian law for investigation of animal cruelty or other crimes.

text.en: Right to Edit: You may update your profile details, profile picture, roles, and tags at any time in the App settings.

_ww-text_text.en: Right to Edit: You may update your profile details, profile picture, roles, and tags at any time in the App settings.

text.en: Right to Delete (Data Safety): You have the right to request the permanent deletion of your account and all associated data.

_ww-text_text.en: Right to Delete (Data Safety): You have the right to request the permanent deletion of your account and all associated data.

text.en: In-App: Navigate to Profile > Delete Account.

_ww-text_text.en: In-App: Navigate to Profile > Delete Account.

text.en: Web Request: If you cannot access the app, email us at contact.animalmitra@gmail.com with the subject "Delete My Account".

_ww-text_text.en: Web Request: If you cannot access the app, email us at contact.animalmitra@gmail.com with the subject "Delete My Account".

text.en: Permissions Required
Camera/Gallery: Required to upload your Profile Picture and photos of animals.

_ww-text_text.en: Camera/Gallery: Required to upload your Profile Picture and photos of animals.

text.en: Notifications: Required to send alerts for interactions and new cases.

_ww-text_text.en: Notifications: Required to send alerts for interactions and new cases.

text.en: No GPS Permission: This App does not request or use Location permissions.

_ww-text_text.en: No GPS Permission: This App does not request or use Location permissions.

text.en: We use secure cloud infrastructure (AWS) and encryption standards to protect your personal data. However, no transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

_ww-text_text.en: We use secure cloud infrastructure (AWS) and encryption standards to protect your personal data. However, no transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

text.en: If you have questions about this policy, please contact us:

_ww-text_text.en: If you have questions about this policy, please contact us:

text.en: Zerofold Internet Private Limited
Email: contact.animalmitra@gmail.com
